name: Romantic Journey
description: Romantic Journey is a Japanese-style visual novel game in which the protagonist, for a variety of reasons, takes a romantic holiday trip with the ladies of the boss's family. "Absolutely torture!" Just joined the company's protagonist, was arranged to accompany the chairman of the company's Qianjin lady and friends to travel...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600 Storage: 200 MB available space
